build.buildCommand: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate

deploy.startCommand: cd server && if [ ! -f prisma/dev.db ]; then echo 'No DB found, creating...' && DATABASE_URL=file:./prisma/dev.db npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && DATABASE_URL=file:./prisma/dev.db node prisma/seed.js; else echo 'DB exists, starting...'; fi && DATABASE_URL=file:./prisma/dev.db node src/server.js
